site.description: This site provides access to official releases of the Service-Technology.org Editor Application "Seda".

category-def.name: Seda
category-def.label: Seda
category-def.description: The core of the Service-Technology.org Editor Application.

category-def.name: 3rd-Party Seda Runtime Files
category-def.label: 3rd-Party Seda Runtime Files
category-def.description: Additional packages and programs that are required by Seda. Most of these packages can also be obtained from their original contributors. They are provided here for convenience and to ensure compatibility with the current release. Some original packages have been extended or modified to ensure compatibility.

category-def.name: Seda Standalone
category-def.label: Seda Standalone
category-def.description: Packages and updates for the standalone Rich Client Platform application for Seda.

category-def.name: Greta
category-def.label: Greta
category-def.description: Graphical Runtime EnvironmenT for Adaptive Processes

category-def.name: Modeling Languages
category-def.label: Modeling Languages
category-def.description: High level modeling languages from which Petri net models can be created.

category-def.name: Petri Nets
category-def.label: Petri Nets
category-def.description: Editors, file formats, analysis tools, and converters for Petri nets.
